attr.title: Super Spy Raccoon
attr.desc: A retro arcade throwback where you hide, sneak, climb, and leap your way to victory! YOU MUST NOT BE SEEN! Do you have the skills to achieve a top score?
attr.inst: Purchase the game on Steam (store.steampowered.com/app/2553530/Super_Spy_Raccoon), download, and copy the .pck file to superspyraccoon/gamedata
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [Steam](store.steampowered.com/app/2553530/Super_Spy_Raccoon), download, and copy the `.pck` file to `superspyraccoon/gamedata`
